scripts.postinstall: command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo 'Using pnpm' || echo 'Using npm'
scripts.start: command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm start || npm start
scripts.build: command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm run build || npm run build
scripts.build:start: command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm run build:start || npm run build:start
scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules && command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1 && pnpm install || npm install
